# JAD (software)

| latest release version = 1.5.8g
| latest release date    =
| programming language   = C++
| operating system       = Cross-platform
| language               = English
| genre                  = Software engineering
| license                = Free for non-commercial use (Copyright: Pavel Kouznetsov)
| website                = }}
Jad (Java Decompiler) is, , an unmaintained decompiler for the Java programming language.
Jad provides a command-line user interface to extract source code from class files.
See also
*Java Decompiler
*Mocha
